>>>>> "Andreas" == Andreas Heck <aheck@...> writes:

    Andreas> I can't decide if this is RESTful and doesn't violate HTTPs
    Andreas> GET semantics.

It definitively doesn't scale. Why do you want to keep the connection
open? And why is polling such a problem?

-- 
Cheers,

Berend de Boer
